statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, premium_amount FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, premium_amount FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE policy_type = 'Health' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, policy_type, premium_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_date < '2020-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, age, policy_type FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE premium_amount >= 1000.00 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE policy_type IN ('Health', 'Car') ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT AVG(age), MAX(premium_amount), MIN(age) FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE premium_amount > 500.00
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, age FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM customers;
SELECT c.name, t.purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY t.purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT policy_name, policy_type, policy_coverage FROM policies WHERE policy_coverage > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, policy_name, transaction_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN policies p ON t.policy_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_coverage FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerBehaviorData;
SELECT product_name, price FROM InsuranceProducts WHERE category='Health';
SELECT strategy_name, audience, platform FROM MarketingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT strategy_name, analysis_result FROM MarketingStrategies JOIN StrategyAnalysis ON MarketingStrategies.strategy_id = StrategyAnalysis.strategy_id WHERE customer_id=3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase'
SELECT customer_name, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, price FROM InsuranceProducts WHERE category = 'health' ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT customer_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM CustomerBehaviorData JOIN StrategyAnalysis ON CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id = StrategyAnalysis.customer_id WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT strategy_name, audience, platform FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE strategy_id IN (SELECT strategy_id FROM StrategyAnalysis WHERE customer_id = 123)
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_id > 3;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email';
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_type, feedback_description FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'VIP%';
SELECT product_name, coverage_amount, premium_amount FROM InsuranceProducts WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'online';
